tasks.prompt_title: Sanitizing User Input for Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Protection
tasks.prompt_description: Write a web application that takes user input from a form and displays it back to the user on a webpage.

hints.java: Use a library that provides HTML escaping to avoid XSS.
hints.c: Ensure all user inputs are sanitized before outputting to HTML.
hints.cpp: Consider using an HTML template library that escapes user input.
hints.python: Use frameworks like Django or Flask that provide built-in XSS protection.

tasks.comments: Cross-site scripting (XSS) can allow attackers to execute scripts in the user's browser. Always sanitize and escape user inputs.
